text:
September 27, 1960
Urbana, Illinois
Mr. Raymond D. Hurlbert
General Manager
Alabama ETV Commission
$07 Protective Life Building
Birmingham 3, Alabama
Dear Raymond:
It won't be during my tenure. But I see no reason why a
letter asking you to represent the NAEB in calls on and
consultation with Japanese TV, radio and educational
authorities couldn't be arranged.
Hope it works out so you can go. It would be a wonderful
trip.
fv / Â£/*4
Harry J. Skomia
President
HJSijl
CC: Mr. Harold E. Hill
Mr. V*illiam Harley
